page.title: 04Housing
page.content: In our area there are a few big houses, but mostly they are family sized or bungalows. They are made out of brick, stone and slab stone. In Milton there are quite a few farm houses and cottages. There are not any building sites or flats. Some of the houses are very old. Many of the modern houses are to be found in the new developments around the Wyke area. Some houses are so old that they do not have anyone living in them. Barns are being converted into living accomodation. Some of the old houses have very thick walls to keep the heat in. Some are of historical interest and are listed buildings.
